subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: St. Louis Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa said first baseman Albert Pujols and his representatives were being pressured by the players’ union during contract negotiations to push for a record contract.
snippet: St. Louis Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa said first baseman Albert Pujols and his representatives were being pressured by the players’ union during contract negotiations to push for a record contract.
